snippet: Evgeni Nabokov made 45 saves and Frans Nielsen and John Tavares scored on Ilya Bryzgalov in a shootout, helping the Islanders beat the Flyers, 1-0, in Philadelphia on Tuesday night.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders defeat Philadelphia Flyers, 1-0; other NHL results noted.
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Nabokov made 45 saves and Frans Nielsen and John Tavares scored on Ilya Bryzgalov in a shootout, helping the Islanders beat the Flyers, 1-0, in Philadelphia on Tuesday night.

headline.seo: Nabokov Has 45 Saves as Islanders Top Flyers in Shootout
headline.main: Nabokov Has 45 Saves as Islanders Top Flyers in Shootout
headline.print_headline: Nabokov Has 45 Saves as Islanders Top Flyers in Shootout
